verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>
to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction;<s%> to <S%H995>discern<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H998>understanding;<s%>
to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> in <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H6664>dealing,<s%> in righteousness, <S%H6664>justice,<s%> and <S%H4339>equity;<s%>
to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6195>prudence<s%> to the <S%H6612>simple,<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion<s%> to the young <S%H5288>man:<s%>

that the <S%H2450>wise<s%> man may <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3254>increase<s%> in <S%H3948>learning;<s%> that the man of <S%H995>understanding<s%> may <S%H7069>attain<s%> to sound <S%H8458>counsel:<s%>
to <S%H995>understand<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and <S%H4426>parables,<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> and <S%H2420>riddles<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> but the <S%H191>foolish<s%> <S%H936>despise<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and <S%H5203>don't<s%> forsake your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8451>teaching:<s%>
for they will be a <S%H3880>garland<s%> to <S%H2580>grace<s%> your <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6060>chains<s%> around your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> if <S%H2400>sinners<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> <S%H14>you,<s%> don't consent.
If they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come<s%> with <S%H693>us,<s%> Let's lay in wait for <S%H1818>blood;<s%> <S%H6845>let<s%>'s lurk secretly for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> without <S%H2600>cause;<s%>
<S%H1104>let<s%>'s swallow them up <S%H2416>alive<s%> like <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> and <S%H8549>whole,<s%> like those who go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit.<s%>
<S%H4672>We<s%>'ll find all <S%H3368>valuable<s%> <S%H1952>wealth.<s%> <S%H4390>We<s%>'ll fill our <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H7998>spoil.<s%>
You shall <S%H5307>cast<s%> your <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H259>us.<s%> We'll all have one <S%H3599>purse.<s%>"
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3212>don't<s%> walk in the <S%H1870>way<s%> with <S%H4513>them.<s%> Keep your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from their <S%H5410>path,<s%>
for their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7451>evil.<s%> They <S%H4116>hurry<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
For in <S%H2600>vain<s%> is the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2219>spread<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of any <S%H1167>bird:<s%>
but these lay <S%H693>wait<s%> for their own <S%H1818>blood.<s%> They lurk <S%H6845>secretly<s%> for their own <S%H5315>lives.<s%>
So are the <S%H734>ways<s%> of everyone who is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> for <S%H1215>gain.<s%> It takes <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of its <S%H1167>owners.<s%>
<S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> <S%H7442>calls<s%> aloud in the <S%H2351>street.<s%> She <S%H5414>utters<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the public <S%H7339>squares.<s%>
She <S%H7121>calls<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of noisy <S%H7218>places.<s%> At the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8179>gates,<s%> she <S%H559>utters<s%> her <S%H561>words:<s%>

"How <S%H6612>long,<s%> you simple ones, will you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H6612>simplicity?<s%> How long will <S%H3887>mockers<s%> <S%H2530>delight<s%> themselves in <S%H3944>mockery,<s%> and <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%>
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> at my <S%H8433>reproof.<s%> <S%H5042>Behold,<s%> I will pour out my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> on <S%H3045>you.<s%> I will make known my words to <S%H1697>you.<s%>
Because I have <S%H7121>called,<s%> and you have <S%H3985>refused;<s%> I have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and no one has paid <S%H7181>attention;<s%>
but you have <S%H6544>ignored<s%> all my <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H14>wanted<s%> none of my <S%H8433>reproof;<s%>
I also will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at your <S%H343>disaster.<s%> I will <S%H3932>mock<s%> when <S%H6343>calamity<s%> overtakes <S%H935>you;<s%>

when <S%H6343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>overtakes<s%> you like a <S%H5492>storm,<s%> when your <S%H343>disaster<s%> <S%H857>comes<s%> on like a <S%H5492>whirlwind;<s%> when <S%H6869>distress<s%> and <S%H6695>anguish<s%> come on <S%H935>you.<s%>
Then will they <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H6030>me,<s%> but I will not answer. They will seek me <S%H7836>diligently,<s%> but they will not find <S%H4672>me;<s%>
because they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and <S%H977>didn't<s%> choose the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
They <S%H14>wanted<s%> none of my <S%H6098>counsel.<s%> They <S%H5006>despised<s%> all my <S%H8433>reproof.<s%>
Therefore they will <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their own <S%H1870>way,<s%> and be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with their own <S%H4156>schemes.<s%>
For the <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> of the <S%H6612>simple<s%> will <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H7962>them.<s%> The careless ease of <S%H3684>fools<s%> will destroy <S%H6>them.<s%>
But whoever <S%H8085>listens<s%> to me will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> and will be at <S%H7599>ease,<s%> without <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H7451>harm.<s%>"
